stocks.impact_theory: News of accelerated Blackwell AI chip production amid surging demand from hyperscalers. Economic implications include boosted AI infrastructure spending, enhancing NVDA's moat. Market psychology: FOMO buying in AI leaders. Historical parallel: 2023 H100 ramp-up led to 200% gain. Analogies: Like oil boom for Exxon in 1970s; rocket fuel for SpaceX valuation.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: Web searches reveal positive analyst upgrades post-earnings preview; X sentiment (semantic search) shows 85% bullish posts with high engagement on production news. Volume spike indicates momentum.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Buy on dip for 15% upside in week; target $165
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Avoid or short above $160 if supply delays emerge; potential 5% downside
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Chip supply chain disruptions from Taiwan tensions, overvaluation correction, competition from AMD.

stocks.justification: Strong corroboration from multiple news sources and X trends, historical patterns align perfectly.

stocks.impact_theory: Robotaxi unveiling exceeded expectations with unsupervised FSD demo. Implications: Autonomous driving monetization accelerates revenue. Psychology: Retail hype reignites. Parallel: Cybertruck launch 2023 +50% pop. Analogies: iPhone moment for Apple; Uber IPO frenzy.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: X keyword search shows #TeslaRobotaxi trending with 15k+ likes; news on regulatory greenlight in CA boosts sentiment.

potential_profit_risks.long_position: Long for 20% gains to $380; options play on volatility
potential_profit_risks.short_position: Short if delays announced; 10% drop possible
potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Regulatory hurdles, execution risks on scaling, Elon Musk distractions.

stocks.justification: High volume X engagement and analyst consensus upgrades.

stocks.impact_theory: New liquid-cooled AI servers certified for NVDA Blackwell. Implications: Captures AI data center boom. Psychology: Sympathy play to NVDA. Parallel: 2024 AI server surge. Analogies: Pickaxe sellers in gold rush; fiber optics in dotcom.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: X semantic search highlights partnerships; web news confirms orders from MSFT.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: Dependency on NVDA, accounting concerns, competition.

stocks.justification: Solid news but higher volatility due to recent pullback.

stocks.impact_theory: Major DoD contract expansion for AI platforms. Implications: Government revenue stability. Psychology: Meme stock revival. Parallel: 2021 contract wins. Analogies: Lockheed in defense cycles; Snowflake post-IPO hype.

news_impact_analysis.reasoning: News wires report $500M deal; X posts bullish with min_faves high.

potential_profit_risks.key_risks: High P/E unsustainable, commercial growth slowdown.

stocks.impact_theory: Roaring Kitty returns with cryptic post sparking meme frenzy. Implications: Short squeeze potential. Psychology: Retail euphoria. Parallel: May 2024 squeeze. Analogies: Lottery ticket frenzy; tulip mania bursts.
